titleStmt.title: The west-country lawyer: or, The witty maids good fortune; who wisely maintain'd her virginity against the golden assaults of the lawyer, who at length married her to her hearts content. To the tune of, The baffled knight. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J[onah]. Deacon, at the Angel, in Gilt-spur-street.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "A youthful lawyer fine and gay ..."
Date, place of publication and publisher's name from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
